list.title: Web Developer
list.subtitle: TCB
list.text: TCB is a steel construction and civil engineering company based in Tunisia. I have the great pleasure of developing their first website to promote them in the Tunisian market and optimize their SEO on the google search engine.

list.title: The Call Of Justice
list.subtitle: Academic Project
list.text: A 2D game including collision detection and the physics of movement coded from scratch.

list.title: Kingdoms
list.subtitle: Plugin Minecraft
list.text: Since I've been playing Minecraft with friends and I heard that it was possible to code some plugins to spicy up things, I decided to start my own plugin. Kingdoms is a Minecraft Plugin simulating wars between realms taking place in the medieval.

list.title: Home Delivery
list.subtitle: Academic Project
list.text: A software for a delivery company developed using the QT framework. It allows the company to manage the delivery of packages and the employees to manage their tasks and the clients to track their packages.

list.title: Emerald Website
list.subtitle: Academic Project
list.text: A <b>FullStack<b> website that manages the operation of a restaurant remotely. it contains many useful features saving time for both the employees and the clients at the same time.

list.title: Hydra
list.subtitle: Academic Project
list.text: A platform for hosting online tournaments including your favorite games, allowing bets and donations to support e-sports players and help them improve their hardware and make a living. The platform regroups a Website, a mobile application and a desktop software.

list.title: General Secretary
list.subtitle: Rotaract NotreDame Connect
list.text: I am one of the founding members of the Rotaract and I was in charge as the general secretary within the executive board.

list.title: Head Of Internal Communications
list.subtitle: Rotaract NotreDame Connect
list.text: I organized some events in order to make new members more comfortable with the charity work even though i have to admit that I didn't dedicate my time to it since the first year of IT engineering was really challenging.

list.title: Student Branch Member
list.subtitle: IEEE
list.text: I participated in the TSYP which is a Tunisian students and young professionals congress held annualy where more than 500 engineering students from several Tunisian universities, as well as young professionals, gather to learn further details about the IEEE technical, professional, and educational benefits and to discuss the future engineering challenges worldwide and in Tunisia. We ended up winning the Power & Energy Society challenge.

list.title: Computer Society Member
list.subtitle: IEEE
list.text: I attented many congresses and workshops to improve my professional skills.

list.title: High school student
list.subtitle: Khaiereddine Becha
list.text: Honestly I wasn't a big fan of my high school but it was a necessary step in my life to learn the basic things and to have insight about science and physics . I got my bachelor degree in <b>Science & physics<b>.

list.title: Student
list.subtitle: Esprit
list.text: This the most exciting step in my life because I started to learn more about programming when it's been my passion since I was a kid. Esprit is a great school that provides me with a lot of opportunities to learn and to grow. I'm currently studying IT engineering in <b>web development<b>.

list.title: Project Management & Pitching
list.subtitle: Rotaract La Marsa Carthage
list.text: During the Racathon which is a Hackathon hosted by Rotaract La Marsa Carthage, we developed ideas about how to save water and started designing a mobile application for that purpose.This event lasted 24 hours so it was exhausting and fun at the same time.

list.title: Sponsoring & Negotiation Technics
list.subtitle: Rotaract NotreDame Connect
list.text: In this occasion I learned how to negotiate with the people at the top of the hierarchy to settle a sponsorship or any deal and how to be prepared mentally and physically for the tough situation I may encounter.

list.title: Programming
list.text: Since I was a kid, I've always been interested by how games were created. I always had a computer at my disposal at a young age, my first game was Warcraft III and I enjoyed my childhood playing it with that constant question in my mind. How was it done ? That curiosity led me to start searching on google and watching random videos on youtube and dailymotion at the time to enlarge my knowledge and that's exactly when I started to inspect the websites code sources to understand how it functions. Now I'm really passionate about <b>Web Development<b> and <b>Problem Solving<b> in general.

list.title: Swimming
list.text: I practiced swimming for 3 years and I liked it so much but sadly I had to stop at a certain age because I was lacking free time.
